title: Mystery gift's from Riot.
body: So i log in this morning on the 17th. The date we were told all the mystery gifts would be given out by.  I just received a mystery gift from riot. One. I bought over 48 mystery skins... Riot said it was 1 free skin for every 6 we buy yeah? That's 8 not 1. Has anyone else received only one when they were due more?

replies.body: Wouldnt it be nice if a rioter posted/replied whats happening with handing out rest of the skins

It would. I patiently waited the entire week. Wondering why I nor no one else had received one. First I heard was someone got one yesterday. Then I logged in and got one this morning and it seems everyone has only received one. Even some people who didn't purchase 6 mystery gifts have received a free skin.

> [{quoted}](name=whitehatingcoon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=odA3pJXI,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-17T05:00:49.978+0000)
>
> It would. I patiently waited the entire week. Wondering why I nor no one else had received one. First I heard was someone got one yesterday. Then I logged in and got one this morning and it seems everyone has only received one. Even some people who didn't purchase 6 mystery gifts have received a free skin.

yeah i have checked other servers, lol forums and everyone seemed to have gotten only 1.
I bought 70 mystery skins/chests and waiting for my remaining 10 :(
sometimes it feels like OCE rioters don't comment on forum posts as much as other servers like NA thought i haven't seen any rioters commenting on this issue on every server

Where did you hear this?
Big novelty to me, and i'm usually pretty up to speed... Sounds a bit like it's made up.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=odA3pJXI,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-17T10:34:19.867+0000)
>
> Where did you hear this?
> Big novelty to me, and i'm usually pretty up to speed... Sounds a bit like it's made up.

you are definitely not up to speed.....
they had a self mystery skin and chest available for 8days or so and 1 free skin for every 6 skin/chest you bought for yourself or friend
check sales board

If you mean this,
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/mystery-skins-return
It only counts skins and gifts bought during the event.

checked NA server and found a rioter's comment
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/mystery-skins-return#


Should be all out by the end of the day. There was a slight snag, but that's been fixed and they should be all rolling out. If you purchased enough to get more than one, keep in mind you'll receive them one at a time because we need to verify that you're eligible every time, so it might be a few hours between each.

 Hollymonster  - about an hour ago
i got another 2.. look out. There system is screwed. i know people who didnt buy any and have got a more then one...

> [{quoted}](name=whitehatingcoon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=odA3pJXI,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-08-18T01:14:15.319+0000)
>
> i got another 2.. look out. There system is screwed. i know people who didnt buy any and have got a more then one...

yeah i got 2 more as well, now need to wait for 8 more
molten rammus
skt t1 vayne
shamrock malph

I got Primetime Draven, Prototype Viktor and Sonoran Kog'Maw. There's actually a few people who didn't buy ANY mystery gifts at all and have still received a free skin. I find it extremely funny. People who weren't involved in the event get a free skin. But the people who spent hundreds on RP for the event. Get messed around waiting on what they already earned.
I bought 6 just for the lolz, i dont really care if i don't receive one, but how muc RP did it cost for 70?

hmmmm.... not sure if i didn't write down the skins i got but only received 10, where as i should've got 11 for buying 70 mystery skin/chests..
gonna send a ticket

Iv received 3.... Im not happy in the slightest..  And they say use your gifting history to keep track of it... 
this is my gifting history take note of the dates and how random they are. 
http://screencast.com/t/OQXeR2Tka4
Iv received 3.... Im not happy in the slightest..
I haven't been given any yet?
Did you buy any during the event?
Didnt even know about event lol
Probably, I buy them all the time

im just wondering why riot decided to sell mystery wards and champions now and not along with skin/chests
just got 2 more skins

Yeah that's it. They did it to get the most of people as a lot of people would of purchased the 790 chests. I got another one. It's pretty pathetic no reply to my ticket. No answers or anything from Riot at all.
still no news
yeah i came to forums to check, i only got 1 after like 200$ of riot points lol
Yeah i spent around 200-250.. I got a skin I sort of wanted by would love to know whats happening with the rest. Iv sent them a ticket.
yeah i hope they give us more lol, let us know what they say
If and when I get a reply from the ticket I'll post it in here. It's a bit stupid, if they can set it up to send one, Just send them all.
yea got 1 instead of 3
